OBJECTIVE.query: minimize sum(x_{d,i} for d in DAYS_OF_WEEK for i in WORKING_DAYS)

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum(x_{d,i} for d in WORKING_DAYS) == 1 for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK
CONSTRAINTS.query: sum(x_{d,i} for d in WORKING_DAYS) == 1 for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum(y_{d,i} for d in WORKING_DAYS) == 1 for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK
CONSTRAINTS.query: sum(y_{d,i} for d in WORKING_DAYS) == 1 for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum(x_{d,i} for d in {Monday, Wednesday}) <= x_{d,i} + x_{d+1,i} for d in {Monday, Wednesday} for i in WORKING_DAYS
CONSTRAINTS.query: sum(x_{d,i} for d in {Monday, Wednesday}) <= x_{d,i} + x_{d+1,i} for d in {Monday, Wednesday} for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum(x_{d,i} for d in {Sunday, Monday}) >= y_{d,i} for d in {Sunday, Monday} for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK
CONSTRAINTS.query: sum(x_{d,i} for d in {Sunday, Monday}) >= y_{d,i} for d in {Sunday, Monday} for i in DAYS_OF_WEEK

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum(x_{d,i} for d in DAYS_OF_WEEK) == EMPLOYEES_REQUIRED[d] for d in DAYS_OF_WEEK
CONSTRAINTS.query: sum(x_{d,i} for d in DAYS_OF_WEEK) == EMPLOYEES_REQUIRED[d] for d in DAYS_OF_WEEK
